headline: A Look At MarketAxess (MKTX) Valuation After Analyst Downgrades And Bond Trading Expansion
summary: Recent analyst revisions for MarketAxess Holdings (MKTX), alongside its push into Treasuries and municipal bonds through acquisitions, have put fresh attention on how the bond trading platform’s expansion might influence investor expectations. See our latest analysis for MarketAxess Holdings. The recent acquisitions and analyst reassessments come after a mixed price pattern for MarketAxess, with a 4.33% 7 day share price return and a 3.19% 30 day decline. The 1 year total shareholder return...
